mapper.select: SELECT r.id "r_id", r.subject "subject", r.content "content", r.viewcnt "viewcnt", r.regdate "r_regdate", u.id "u_id", u.username "username", u.password "password", u.name "name", u.authorities "authorities", u.regdate "u_regdate", u.car_name "car_name", u.car_number "car_number", u.phone_number "phone_number", p.id "p_id", p.addr "addr", p.weekend_begin_time "weekend_begin_time", p.weekend_end_time "weekend_end_time", p.weekday_begin_time "weekday_begin_time", p.weekday_end_time "weekday_end_time", p.holiday_begin_time "holiday_begin_time", p.holiday_end_time "holiday_end_time", p.holiday_pay_nm "holiday_pay_nm", p.fulltime_monthly "fulltime_monthly", p.weekday_pay_nm "weekday_pay_nm", p.saturday_pay_nm "saturday_pay_nm", p.tel "tel", p.parking_name "parking_name" FROM t404_review_write r, t404_user u, t404_parkinglot p WHERE r.user_id = u.id and r.parking_id = p.id ORDER BY r.id DESC
